src:
Stjernespiss opp i ryggen p√• Haaland etter ny scoring
Hans-Didier Flick startet sin karriere som midlertidig trener i Bayern M√ºnchen med seier.
06 Nov 2019, 20:18 by NTB

BAYERN M√úNCHEN - OLYMPIAKOS 2‚Äì0

Det var spilt n√¶rmere 70 minutter da Robert Lewandowski sprakk nullen. Han scoret sitt m√•l nummer 21 p√• 17 kamper denne sesongen. I Champions League var det hans sjette, og dermed er han bare ett m√•l bak turneringens toppscorer Erling Braut Haaland.
Innbytter Ivan Perisic hadde vel knapt v√¶rt p√• banen ett minutt da han la p√• til 2-0. Olympiakos var kj√∏rt og orket ikke √• jobbe bakover, og da kom Bayern M√ºnchen i stort overtall.

Haalands teknikk imponerer: ‚Äì Han er best i verden til √• ta straffespark

Seieren til tross: Det er noe som ikke fungerer i Tysklands mektigste fotballklubb. Det er mye rusk i maskineriet selv om det er lite √• utsette p√• m√•lformen til Lewandowski.
Manager Niko Kovac fikk sparken sist s√∏ndag, dagen etter 1-5-smellen for Eintracht Frankfurt. Derfor var det assistenten Hans-Dieter Flick som styrte troppene mot Olympiakos. Helgens nederlag i Frankfurt var Bayern M√ºnchens styggeste tap i Bundesliga siden 2009, og klubben ligger bare p√• 4.-plass p√• tabellen.
Bayern M√ºnchen var ogs√• bare minutter unna √• ryke ut av den tyske cupen mot svake Bochum, et lag som er plassert tredje sist i 2. Bundesliga.
I Champions League har det g√•tt bedre for tysk fotballs lokomotiv. De har vunnet alle sine kamper s√• langt, sist ble det 3-2 i bortekampen mot Olympiakos med Lewandowski (2) og Corentin Tolisso som m√•lscorere.
Onsdagens seier gj√∏r at de st√•r med full pott etter fire spilte kamper.

Fakta: Champions League menn onsdag, gruppespillet 4. runde:


Gruppe A:


Paris Saint-Germain (Frankrike) ‚Äì Brugge (Belgia) 1-0 (1-0), Real Madrid (Spania) ‚Äì Galatasaray (Tyrkia) 6-0 (4-0).


Gruppe B:


Bayern M√ºnchen (Tyskland) ‚Äì Olympiakos (Hellas) 2-0 (1-0), R√∏de Stjerne (Serbia) ‚Äì Tottenham (England) 0-4 (0-1).


Gruppe C:


Atalanta (Italia) ‚Äì Manchester C. (England) 1-1 (0-1), Dinamo Zagreb (Kroatia) ‚Äì Sjakhtar Donetsk (Ukraina) 3-3 (1-1).


Gruppe D:


Lokomotiv Moskva (Russland) ‚Äì Juventus (Italia) 1-2 (1-1), Leverkusen (Tyskland) ‚Äì Atl√©tico Madrid (Spania) 2-1 (1-0).


Ferdig som Bayern M√ºnchen-trener etter st√∏rste tap p√• ti √•r



Bayern M√ºnchen-trener Hans-Dieter Flick under onsdagens kamp mot Olympiakos i Champions League.üì∑ Foto: Matthias Schrader / AP / NTB scanpix.

Lite framgang
Likevel har ikke resultatene og banespillet st√•tt i stil med klubbens ambisi√∏se m√•lsettinger den siste tiden, og det ble Kovacs bane. Det hjalp ikke at han trente klubben fram til ¬´The Double¬ª og seier i supercupen sist sesong.
Det er nok √• ta tak i for den som blir Bayern M√ºnchens nye trener.
Selv om onsdagens kamp gikk hjemme i egen storstue var det lite mot og oppfinnsomhet √• spore i de f√∏rste 45 minuttene mot grekerne. Tempoet var svakt, og Bayern M√ºnchen n√∏yde seg som oftest med tafatt sm√•spill og ufarlig trilling av ball.
Bayern hadde kontrollen og kampens st√∏rste sjanse da Benjamin Pavard skj√∏t i stolpen, men de sprudlet ikke. Hjemmelaget lignet p√• mange m√•ter som det formsvake laget de har framst√•tt som siden sesongstarten.
Bedring
Det bedret seg etter hvilen. Bayern M√ºnchen dro til med en gedigen dobbeltsjanse i starten av 2. omgang. Robert Lewandowskis heading gikk rett p√• keeper Jos√© S√°.
Scoringen senere i kampen gjorde at polakken har scoret i √•tte gruppespillskamper p√• rad i Champions Leauge.
Omar Elabdellaoui, som er lagkaptein i Olympiakos, spilte hele kampen p√• h√∏yrebacken.


Tottenham' Son Heung-min etter sin f√∏rste scoring mot R√∏de Stjerne.üì∑ ANDREW BOYERS /Reuters

Tottenham vant
I den andre kampen i gruppe B endte det med 4-0 og bortseier for Tottenham mot R√∏de Stjerne. London-klubben er opp i sju poeng og 2.-plass i gruppa bak Bayern.
1-0-scoringen kom etter tidenes flipperspill etter 34 minutters spill. M√•let var ferdigscoret b√•de to og tre ganger f√∏r Giavani Lo Celso fikk √¶ren av √• sette den siste returen i m√•l. Harry Kane og Son Heung-min hadde begge pr√∏vd seg to ganger, hvorav begge hadde truffet metallet, og Deli Alli √©n gang i det sammenhengende bombardementet som endte med at Lo Celso scoret.
12 minutter ut i 2. omgang kom nummer to. Son Heung-min gr√•t t√•rer sist helg etter skreddskaden til Andr√© Gomes i kampen mot Everton. Onsdag kveld sendte han en hilsen i retning Gomes etter kvalitetsscoringen som ga 2-0.
Minutter senere var det duket for Son igjen etter nok et str√•lende angrepsspill. Han avsluttet etter hvert i tomt bur til 3-0. Innbytter Christian Eriksen n√¶rmest spaserte ballen i m√•l til 4-0 fem minutter f√∏r full tid.


Douglas Costa har nettopp scoret Juventus' vinnerm√•l p√• overtid.üì∑ Alexander Zemlianichenko / AP

Costa-magi sendte Juventus videre
I den andre Champions League-kampen som hadde ¬´tidlig¬ª kampstart onsdag kveld, s√• Juventus ut til √• m√•tte utsette feiringen av avansement. S√• tok Douglas Costa saken i egne hender p√• overtid og ordnet 2-1 over Lokomotiv Moskva.
Med seier i Moskva er Juventus allerede klar for cupspillet i Champions League, men laget m√•tte slite for poengene i regnv√¶ret.
Det var i kampens tredje overtidsminutt at innbytter Costa satte fart innover p√• banen fra venstrekanten. Han suste forbi et par motspillere og inviterte til vegg med Gonzalo Higua√≠n, som sendte ballen tilbake med et frekt h√¶lspark. Costa avsluttet med et skudd mellom beina p√• keeper.
Det var ikke f√∏rste gang ballen forsvant mellom beina p√• Guilherme i hjemmem√•let, men p√• vinnerm√•let kunne han ikke klandres. Kampens f√∏rste m√•l, f√∏r det var spilt fire minutter, var derimot en gavepakke fra hjemmelagets keeper.
Cristiano Ronaldo tok frispark ute ved venstre sidelinje. Han sendte ballen rett p√• m√•lvakten, som slapp den mellom beina sine. Ballen traff h√¶len hans og trillet mot det √•pne m√•let. Aaron Ramsey n√•dde den akkurat p√• m√•lstreken og sparte Guilherme fra √• bli oppf√∏rt med selvm√•l ved √• dytte den inn.
Lokomotiv trengte ikke lang tid p√• √• reise seg fra det sjokket, og utligningen kom allerede √•tte minutter senere. Aleksej Mirantsjuk ble m√•lscorer da han p√• innlegg fra Jo√£o M√°rio nikket i stolpen og fikk returen rett i beina slik at han kunne score et like enkelt m√•l som Ramseys.
Men p√• overtid dukket alts√• Costa opp og sikret tre poeng for italienerne.
Juventus-seieren betyr at laget har 10 poeng p√• fire kamper og ikke kan innhentes av Lokomotiv eller Leverkusen. De to sistnevnte er begge fire poeng bak Atl√©tico Madrid i kamp om 2.-plassen.
text:
Star tip up in the back at Haaland after a new scoring
Hans-Didier Flick started his career as a temporary coach in Bayern Munich with victory.
06 Nov 2019, 20:18 by NTB

BAVERN MUNCH - OLYMPIAKOS 2‚Äì0

It was played nearly 70 minutes when Robert Lewandowski cracked the zero. He scored his No. 21 goal in 17 games this season. In the Champions League it was his sixth, and thus he is only one goal behind the tournament's top scorer Erling Braut Haaland.
Substitutes Ivan Perisic had hardly been on the field one minute when he put up 2-0. Olympiakos was driven and unable to work backwards, and then Bayern Munich came in great numbers.

Haaland's technique impresses: - He is the best in the world to take penalties

Despite the win: It's something that doesn't work in Germany's most powerful football club. There is a lot of debris in the machinery, although there is little to put on Lewandowski's goal form.
Manager Niko Kovac was fired last Sunday, the day after the 1-5 meltdown for Eintracht Frankfurt. Therefore, it was assistant Hans-Dieter Flick who directed the troops against Olympiakos. This weekend's defeat in Frankfurt was Bayern Munich's ugliest loss in the Bundesliga since 2009, and the club is only in 4th place on the table.
Bayern Munich were also only minutes away from the German Cup against weak Bochum, a team that placed third last in the 2nd Bundesliga.
In the Champions League things have gone better for German football's locomotive. They have won all their matches so far, most recently being 3-2 in the away game against Olympiakos with Lewandowski (2) and Corentin Tolisso as goal scorers.
Wednesday's win means they are in full pot after four games played.

Facts: Men's Champions League Wednesday, Group Round 4:


Group A:


Paris Saint-Germain (France) - Bruges (Belgium) 1-0 (1-0), Real Madrid (Spain) - Galatasaray (Turkey) 6-0 (4-0).


Group B:


Bayern Munich (Germany) - Olympiakos (Greece) 2-0 (1-0), Red Star (Serbia) - Tottenham (England) 0-4 (0-1).


Group C:


Atalanta (Italy) - Manchester C. (England) 1-1 (0-1), Dinamo Zagreb (Croatia) - Shakhtar Donetsk (Ukraine) 3-3 (1-1).


Group D:


Locomotive Moscow (Russia) - Juventus (Italy) 1-2 (1-1), Leverkusen (Germany) - Atl√©tico Madrid (Spain) 2-1 (1-0).


Finished as Bayern Munich coach after the biggest loss in ten years



Bayern Munich coach Hans-Dieter Flick during Wednesday's match against Olympiakos in the Champions League.üì∑ Photo: Matthias Schrader / AP / NTB scanpix.

Little progress
Nevertheless, the results and the playing field have not been in line with the club's ambitious goals lately, and it became Kovac's course. It didn't help that he coached the club up to "The Double" and won the Super Cup last season.
There is plenty to cater for who becomes Bayern Munich's new coach.
Although Wednesday's game went home in its own main room, there was little courage and ingenuity to track for the first 45 minutes against the Greeks. The pace was sluggish, and Bayern Munich usually satisfied themselves with awkward small play and harmless throwing of the ball.
Bayern had control and the biggest chance of the match when Benjamin Pavard shot in the post, but they did not burst. The home team was similar in many ways to the formidable team they have appeared since the start of the season.
Improvement
It improved after rest. Bayern Munich went with a solid double chance at the start of the second half. Robert Lewandowski's header went straight to keeper Jos√© S√°.
The score later in the match resulted in the pole having scored in eight consecutive group games in the Champions Leauge.
Omar Elabdellaoui, the team captain in Olympiakos, played the entire match on the right back.


Tottenham 'Son Heung-min after his first goal against the Red Star.üì∑ ANDREW BOYERS / Reuters

Tottenham won
In the second match of Group B, it ended 4-0 and lost to Tottenham against the Red Star. The London club is up seven points and 2nd place in the group behind Bavaria.
The 1-0 score came after pinball play after 34 minutes of play. The goal was scored both two and three times before Giavani Lo Celso got the honor of setting the final return. Harry Kane and Son Heung-min had both tried twice, both of them hitting the metal, and Deli Alli once in the continuous bombing that ended with Lo Celso scoring.
12 minutes into the second half came second. Son Heung-min cried last weekend after the injury to Andr√© Gomes in the fight against Everton. On Wednesday night, he sent a greeting in the direction of Gomes after the quality score which gave 2-0.
Minutes later, Son had left after another brilliant attacking game. He eventually finished in the empty cage to 3-0. Substitutes Christian Eriksen almost walked the ball in goal to 4-0 five minutes before full time.


Douglas Costa has just scored Juventus' winning goal in overtime.üì∑ Alexander Zemlianichenko / AP

Costa magic sent Juventus on
In the second Champions League match that had an "early" match start on Wednesday night, Juventus looked to have to postpone the celebration of advancement. Then Douglas Costa took the matter into his own hands in overtime and settled 2-1 over Lokomotiv Moscow.
With victory in Moscow, Juventus is already ready for the Champions League Cup game, but the team had to struggle for the points in the rain.
It was in the third overtime minute of the match that substitutes Costa set in on the pitch from the left. He whistled past a couple of opponents and invited to the wall with Gonzalo Higua√≠n, who sent the ball back with a cheeky heel. Costa finished with a shot between the legs of the keeper.
It was not the first time the ball disappeared between the legs of Guilherme in the home goal, but on the winning goal he could not be blamed. The first goal of the match, before it was played four minutes, however, was a gift package from the home team's keeper.
Cristiano Ronaldo took the free-kick off the left flank. He sent the ball straight to the goalkeeper, who dropped it between his legs. The ball hit his heel and rolled toward the open goal. Aaron Ramsey just reached the finish line and saved Guilherme from being self-inflicted by pushing it in.
The locomotive didn't need long to recover from that shock, and the equalization came eight minutes later. Aleksej Mirantsjuk became the scorer when Jo√£o M√°rio's head nodded and got the return straight to his feet so he could score an easy goal like the Ramseys.
But in overtime Costa appeared and secured three points for the Italians.
The Juventus win means the team has 10 points in four matches and cannot be obtained by Lokomotiv or Leverkusen. The latter two are both four points behind Atl√©tico Madrid in the 2nd place match.
